abstract: Turkish government orders over 100 media outlets to close as part of its sweeping crackdown in wake of quashed military coup.
lead_paragraph: It has dismissed over 1,000 military personnel and ordered the shutdown of 45 newspapers, three news agencies, 16 television channels, 15 magazines and 29 publishers.

headline.main: Turkey Expands Purge, Shutting Down News Media Outlets
headline.print_headline: News Outlets in Turkey Ordered Shut in Crackdown

snippet: It has dismissed over 1,000 military personnel and ordered the shutdown of 45 newspapers, three news agencies, 16 television channels, 15 magazines and 29 publishers....
